about_the_game:
This demo contains a portion of the full game, with an alternate ending.

Demo Duration: 10-15 minutes

Delirium is a first-person psychological horror game focused on building tension.

content_descriptors.notes: The game insinuates frightening scenarios that may disturb some players.

detailed_description:
This demo contains a portion of the full game, with an alternate ending.

Demo Duration: 10-15 minutes

Delirium is a first-person psychological horror game focused on building tension.
name: Delirium Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Delirium is a psychological horror game set in a suburban house.
